cu.explanation_en: Setting mnc to an out-of-range value 999 will cause PLMN validation errors, leading to configuration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting mnc to an out-of-range value 999 will cause PLMN validation errors, leading to configuration rejection.
du.explanation_zh: 將 mnc 設定為超出範圍的值 999 會導致 PLMN 驗證錯誤，造成配置拒絕。
